name: Call Scary Teacher Neighbor
description:
Hello Welcome to Scary Teacher Neighbor fake Call Simulator Prank this app will allow you to receive a call from your favorite scary Teacher 3d : gaveling gary, thierry teacher, kavita teacher, misty misty misty, skier teacher...

Scary Teacher 3D Neighbor Call Simulator Prank app simulate fake incoming calls with the creepy character Scary Teacher 3d Neighbor, with her real voice or from her scary teacher's house (in case of a life video call).

by a simple click you can live the scary experiment of talking to Scary teacher 3d Neighbor, it’s an easy app to entertain yourself or prank your friends and family and see their hilarious reactions , the calls looks so realistic and they will believe your really talking with your teacher 3d.

Disclaimer :
You can't make a real call, this is just a prank App! The app does not bear any harm and is only for entertainment!
